submitConfirm.title: Submit Quiz?
submitConfirm.description: You have {{unanswered}} unanswered questions. Are you sure you want to submit?

quickQuizConfig.title: Quick Quiz Configuration
quickQuizConfig.configureSubtitle: Customize your random question quiz with your preferred settings
quickQuizConfig.quizSettingsDesc: Configure the number of questions, time limit, and question sources
quickQuizConfig.sourceHint: Choose which question banks to randomly select from
quickQuizConfig.info1: Questions are randomly selected from available question banks
quickQuizConfig.info2: Each quiz is unique and never the same twice
quickQuizConfig.info3: Perfect for quick practice sessions and testing your knowledge
quickQuizConfig.info4: You can take as many quick quizzes as you want
